main event: A woman and her son observed an object shaped like a flying wing, similar in size to a B-36, with dull gray coloring on the bottom and a series of orange glowing windows while it traveled at jet-like speeds.
interesting points: The object was reported to be a dull gray on the bottom and had a series of orange glowing windows,The sighting was made from a window while the observer was writing letters,The object was estimated to be large enough to be seen clearly by average eyesight,The object was viewed for approximately 10 to 15 seconds,The observers are acknowledged to have been following flying saucer publicity but described as stable and calm.
sighted object: flying wing shaped object with orange glowing windows
witness description: a woman and her old son
